duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide superior customer service and warm greetings to all residents and guests arriving or departing the property.
Maintain an active presence at the Front Desk, announcing visitors and controlling access to the property.
Handle concierge duties enthusiastically, including processing mail, making recommendations, and arranging transportation and services.
Possess and share in-depth knowledge of local attractions, nightlife, and special services to enhance resident living experience.
Adhere to Front Desk procedures, review and complete reports, respond to emergency situations, and resolve resident and guest concerns.
Undertake administrative tasks related to the Front Desk operations, and assist in training concierge staff.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalency required. Degree in hospitality management or business administration desired. Fluency in foreign languages is a plus.
